title: Asian earth
brief_description: Documents the activities and provlems of a Hindu peasant family of the lower Ganges Valley. They are seen at work, play, and worship during the cycle of one year. In the narration, the mother of the family presents here explanation and interpretation. (Awards: First prize at Golden Reel Festival; Cleveland; Stamford; Illinois)
